TopicTitle: Who's amazing flag packs are these?

Articles.Content:
I'd like to download the entire packs instead of having to download them one by one. Anyone know who this belongs to?

Also, how would I post the Imgur compilation so you can see it without having to click the link?

Edited February 6, 2014 by Specialist290
Link to gallery removed for linking to prohibited content.

you can use [ imgur ] tags around the random letters at the end of the link, like so:

-- snip --

On the imgur page, below the images, to the right of where it says 1 of 162, is a link that says Download.

Edited February 6, 2014 by FEichinger
Gallery removed for containing prohibited content.

Very cool set, however there is a certain flag in there...

Edited February 6, 2014 by Specialist290

Since the gallery in question does contain material that goes against forum rules, I've taken the liberty of removing the link. The moderation staff's thanks go out to those who brought this to our attention. If there's a "sanitized" version out there that doesn't contain the offending flags, feel free to link to and discuss that instead.

On a related note, keep in mind that discussions of a political, ideological, or religious nature are still against forum rules.

Edited February 6, 2014 by Specialist290
The flags in question didn't have offending material though. No more than flags of existing countries.
